member.name: T:Windows.UI.ApplicationSettings.SettingsEdgeLocation
member.summary: Specifies the edge of the screen where the Settings charms appear.
member.deprecated: SettingsEdgeLocation is deprecated and might not work on all platforms. For more info, see MSDN.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.ApplicationSettings.SettingsEdgeLocation.Left
member.summary: The Settings charm appears on the left edge of the screen.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.ApplicationSettings.SettingsEdgeLocation.Right
member.summary: The Settings charm appears on the right edge of the screen.

member.name: T:Windows.UI.ApplicationSettings.SettingsPane
member.summary: A static class that enables the app to control the Settings Charm pane. The app can add or remove commands, receive a notification when the user opens the pane, or open the pane programmatically.
member.deprecated: SettingsPane is deprecated and might not work on all platforms. For more info, see MSDN.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.ApplicationSettings.SettingsPane.Edge
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the Settings charm appears on the left or right edge of the screen.
member.returns: The location of the Settings charm.

member.name: E:Windows.UI.ApplicationSettings.SettingsPane.CommandsRequested
member.summary: Occurs when the user opens the settings pane. Listening for this event lets the app initialize the setting commands and pause its UI until the user closes the pane.

member.name: M:Windows.UI.ApplicationSettings.SettingsPane.GetForCurrentView
member.summary: Gets a SettingsPane object that is associated with the current app view (that is, with CoreWindow ).
member.deprecated: SettingsPane is deprecated and might not work on all platforms. For more info, see MSDN.

member.name: M:Windows.UI.ApplicationSettings.SettingsPane.Show
member.summary: Displays the Settings Charm pane to the user.
member.deprecated: SettingsPane is deprecated and might not work on all platforms. For more info, see MSDN.

member.name: T:Windows.UI.ApplicationSettings.SettingsPaneCommandsRequest
member.summary: Contains properties that are only available during the CommandsRequested event.
member.deprecated: SettingsPaneCommandsRequest is deprecated and might not work on all platforms. For more info, see MSDN.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.ApplicationSettings.SettingsPaneCommandsRequest.ApplicationCommands
member.summary: A vector that is available during the CommandsRequested event. Append SettingsCommand objects to it to make them available to the SettingsPane UI.

member.name: T:Windows.UI.ApplicationSettings.SettingsPaneCommandsRequestedEventArgs
member.summary: Contains arguments that are available from the event object during the CommandsRequested event.
member.deprecated: SettingsPaneCommandsRequestedEventArgs is deprecated and might not work on all platforms. For more info, see MSDN.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.ApplicationSettings.SettingsPaneCommandsRequestedEventArgs.Request
member.summary: An instance of SettingsPaneCommandsRequest that is made available during the CommandsRequested event.
